content: Are you talking about a theme? See https://addons.thunderbird.net/En-US/thunderbird/static-themes/
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Create a local or account folder and add an action to actually move the message out of the inbox as part of the filter processing.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Thanks Matt Sounds good! I have applied that to my filters (assuming the move should be after the forward). I await relevant emails to test this. Given that it will work, that is very good. There is the downside that I have to look in two folders for new mail - the inbox and specially created folder, given that I want to see it, and have it passed on automatically. But that is still way better than where I am now!
creator: 29847gv

content: You could create a saved search (ctrl+Shift+F) to locate unread mail in both folders and simply use that instead of the inbox. It will show up in the folder pane as a folder is saved. The downside is it is not updated until you select it.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
My guess is 1 being the visual representation of the failure of 2 to actually be formatted as a HTML file. Are you another of those that has created something in word and tried to attach that?

See the instructions we wrote about 15 years ago. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/signatures#w_signatures-stored-in-files
creator: MattAuSupport

content: If I understand your post correctly, Thunderbird has no interaction whatsoever with your Gmail account? If that's the case then, no, TB couldn't do anything.
creator: arlev

content: Unless something changed in TB between your last download and when you got the error, it sounds more like a problem with the email server. Have you connected to your email provider using a browser?
creator: arlev

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Autenticazione a 2 fattori
creator: @next

content:
linusr said
Hi, tbird 128.5.2esr w11p. Is there a way to archive gmail? There is no gmail acct in archives. And, if an archive for gmail can be created, can it be local only? I want to clear the inbox of old stuff but save it (locally). Also,I don't know if this is the right forum for this ques. pls move if nec. Thank you.

The short answer is no.

Gmail archives to its own all mail folder. Your best bet in my opinion is use Google takeout to archive all mail be label and subsequently import that to Thunderbird as the MBOX format used is compatible with Thunderbird. How to delete all your mail I have no idea. Gmail tends to make that hard.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Have you tried clicking on that triangle to see why the program is complaining about the address. My guess is it is already in Thunderbird, but it really would be good to check what Thunderbird is trying to tell you.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I solved the problem by moving the B of Bruce all the way to the left. Bruce is my middle name and because I first set up some accounts using my first name, Thunderbird placed that first name in the "Your Full Name" each time I set up those previous email accounta. I went back after awhile and and imagined that the B of Bruce might be a a character space to the right of where it should be, corrected it and the setup was flawless!
creator: brustek

content: Dal messaggio di errore sembrerebbe che il tuo indirizzo email sia stato bloccato, probabilmente per attività anomale. Devi contattare il tuo provider email per farti sbloccare l'invio da client. O in alternativa chiedere la revisione della tua situazione al secondo indirizzo citato sopra. Entrambe le cose non dipendono comunque da Thunderbird che ti sta solo mostrando il messaggio di errore che riceve dal server.
creator: @next

content: Traduit avec Google - Il ne s'agit pas seulement du mot de passe lorsque vous créez un compte. Vous devez également utiliser l'authentification correcte avec d'autres paramètres. Accédez à la page de votre fournisseur de messagerie avec les bons paramètres et suivez-les à chaque étape de la création d'un nouveau compte.
creator: arlev
